post.body: was just on your site. You are streaming a dark workshop live. It's thrilling!
this will be my first one.
yes it is a great tool. You can find me at Renaissanceww. Hoping to record a podcast this weekend with it.
no problems. Rendering a 30 min one right now in fact.
last time I was in Greece I was with a bunch of blond girls and the Greeks looked at us like we were from another planet
works fine. Maybe I'm used to its quirks now.
where does a blond girl learn to make baklava?
still using AVS video editor 4.1 for my enhanced podcasts
your site reads very well on an iPhone by the way!
I remember that when you first posted it but had forgotten all about it. Very helpful thanks for the refresh.
it was a restraining order!
I posted my biblical query on lumberjocks last night and got some great responses including a painting.
maybe you can learn to cha cha and tango while your there
of course the expected is 20 meetings/ week but if you just want to get by with the minimum amount of flair...
that doesn't count internal meetings.
ran into something similar with Grizzly a few years back. When I called I was able to use multiple gc
New RWW episode up. #21 I come of age, drinks are on me! http://tinyurl.com/84cwox
Off to meetings 2-4 of new year. Listnin to Galoot enroute
Just got a direct email from The Schwarz! I'm as giddy as a schoolgirl.
here is the link to the LJ post for the curious: http://tinyurl.com/9fdfm6
